intro: Coelogyne oligantha, commonly known as the slender orchid, is a member of the Orchidaceae family and is native to Southeast Asia. It is characterized by its compact growth habit and produces clusters of fragrant, white to pale yellow flowers. The plant typically grows on trees or rocks in shaded, humid environments. Its pseudobulbs are slender and cylindrical, and it has linear,革质 (leathery) leaves. Coelogyne oligantha is prized in horticulture for its ornamental value and is often cultivated for its delicate floral display.
